Write log events to the specified file.
member.exception: Thrown when one or more required arguments are null.
member.param: The Amazon S3 access key id.
(Optional) The minimum level for events passed through the sink. Ignored when is specified.
(Optional) Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.
(Optional) A switch allowing the pass-through minimum level to be changed at runtime.
(Optional) The interval at which logging will roll over to a new file.
(Optional) Character encoding used to write the text file. The default is UTF-8 without BOM.
A value indicating whether the first event should be emitted immediately or not.
member.returns: The configuration object allowing method chaining.

member.summary: Write log events to the specified file.
member.exception: Thrown when one or more required arguments are null.

(Optional) A switch allowing the pass-through minimum level to be changed at runtime.
(Optional) A message template describing the format used to write to the sink. The default is "{Timestamp:yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fff zzz} [{Level:u3}] {Message:lj}{NewLine}{Exception}".

(Optional) The interval at which logging will roll over to a new file.

A value indicating whether the first event should be emitted immediately or not.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.AmazonS3.RollingInterval
member.summary: Specifies the frequency at which the log file should roll.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.AmazonS3.RollingInterval.Infinite
member.summary: The log file will never roll; no time period information will be appended to the log file name.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.AmazonS3.RollingInterval.Year
member.summary: Roll every year. File names will have a four-digit year appended in the pattern yyyy.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.AmazonS3.RollingInterval.Month
member.summary: Roll every calendar month. File names will have yyyyMM appended.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.AmazonS3.RollingInterval.Day
member.summary: Roll every day. File names will have yyyyMMdd appended.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.AmazonS3.RollingInterval.Hour
member.summary: Roll every hour. File names will have yyyyMMddHH appended.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.AmazonS3.RollingInterval.Minute
member.summary: Roll every minute. File names will have yyyyMMddHHmm appended.

member.summary: This class contains extension methods for the enumeration.
